channel.title: Need advice (mouse/gfx/webcam)
channel.description:
I haven't kept up with hardware for the last year or so, and I want to buy a new mouse, graphics card and maybe a webcam depending on how cheap I can get a decent one.
Mouse - I'm not sure if I want wired or wireless. It would be nice to not have the wire, but is it worth it? Looking to spend < $100.
Graphics - I'm not a huge gamer, but I definitely need an upgrade from my current card (8800gs). Looking for something in medium-high power/price range, ~$150 ??
Webcam - I have no clue. I just need something to skype with, would be nice if it had a built-in mic. Wouldn't mind spending a bit more if I could get an HD one to record video once in a while.
Advise me !!
